CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 像；如同；作为；身为；以…身份；当作
像…一样；和…一样；以…方式；照…方式；按…的方式；正如；如同；如同…那样；就像；相当于；当；在…时候；当…的时候；在…期间；因为；由于；尽管；虽然；随着；为了；以便；（so/such as）以至于
同样；同样地；一样；一样地；比如；例如；诸如；照…一样；被认为
（As）阿斯（古罗马重量单位和铜币）
（AS）见票照付（after sight的缩写）；科学院（Academy of Science的缩写）

synonym.mean: 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时

word_mean_info__list.difference: 从属连词，语意强，着重直接的原因或理由，所引出的从句是全句的重心，用以回答why提出的问题。
并列连词，语气较弱，所引出的句子一般放在后面，表示附带说明的理由或推断理由。
从属连词，语意较because, since弱，着重在主句，所表示的原因或理由是“附带的”。
语意比because弱，但比as强，一般用于表示“由于大家已知的事实”。

word_group.brief_definition: 以及, 也, 和…一样
作为, 充当, 担任
诸如…之类的, 例如, 那种的, 像…的, 那些人
俗话说；正如老话所说；常言道
众所周知；正如我们所知

bilingual.source: Her voice danced as high as the whistles of birds.
bilingual.target: 她的声音像鸟鸣一样高。

bilingual.source: Bella ran as she had never run before.
bilingual.target: 贝拉像从未跑过一样奔跑。

bilingual.source: In the library, there are as many books as stars in the sky.
bilingual.target: 图书馆里的书就像天上的星星那么多。

bilingual.source: He felt as if he were a bird in a nest.
bilingual.target: 他感觉自己像是巢中的一只鸟。

bilingual.source: In Chengdu, we have as many teahouses as leaves in a cup of tea!
bilingual.target: 在成都，我们有很多茶馆，就像一杯茶里的茶叶一样多！

bilingual.source: One day, as usual, she bathed herself in the fast-flowing water.
bilingual.target: 有一天，像往常一样，她在湍急的河水中洗澡。

bilingual.source: My students chose each item carefully, just as the students in the class one hundred years ago did.
bilingual.target: 我的学生们仔细选择每一件物品，就像一百年前的学生们一样。

bilingual.source: Her smile was as sly as a devil.
bilingual.target: 她的笑容像恶魔一样狡猾。

list.abstract: AS（英[az]，美[æz]），英语单词，作形容词用，为如同；如。作连词用，为当；以…的方式；如同…那样。作介词用，为作为；以…的身份；当…时。短语搭配有AS level（高级补充考试；高级补充考试合格成绩），例句为“It talks about many things, such as weak leadership, and suppression of disagreement.（它谈到了许多事情，比如软弱的领导，以及压制分歧。）” AS连词类近义词有because、although、since等，介词类近义词有in the light of、like，副词类近义词有equally、similarly、same等。

亚斯伯格综合征（英语：Asperger syndrome ，简称AS），又名亚斯伯格症候群或亚氏保加症，是一种泛自闭症障碍，其是根据奥地利儿科医师汉斯·亚斯伯格命名。1944年，他在研究中首度记录具有缺乏非语言沟通技巧、在同侪间表露低度同理心、肢体不灵活等情形的儿童。 其重要特征是社交困难，伴随着兴趣狭隘及重复特定行为，但相较于其他泛自闭症障碍，仍相对保有语言及认知发展。亚斯伯格症患者经常出现肢体互动障碍和语言表达方式异常等状况，但并不需要接受治疗。

yingyinNormal.en: Today, it's as easy as changing a light bulb.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在就像换灯泡一样简单.

yingyinNormal.en: Sweetheart, we love you just as much as Ross.
yingyinNormal.zh: 甜心，我们爱你就像我们爱罗斯。

yingyinNormal.en: They're not as complicated as yours. They are very simple.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们不像你的那么复杂，它们极简单。

yingyinNormal.en: It's just as the Chief described it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像酋长所说的。

yingyinNormal.en: He's just like the one we built as kids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他就像我们小的时候堆的雪人。

yingyinNormal.en: He's just like the one we built as kids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他就像我们小的时候堆的雪人。

yingyinNormal.en: As does your Vulcan crew member, isn't that right, Spock?
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像你的维肯星船员一样，对吗，史波克？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, and hors d'oeuvres are delightful. As is the company.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对啊，开胃小吃令人愉悦，就像我的女伴。

yingyinNormal.en: And as we discussed, the official school policy is abstinence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正像我们讨论过的，学校的规定是节欲。

yingyinNormal.en: You'd be just as amazed how quickly it goes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想像不到时间过得有多快。

yingyinNormal.en: I am as conflicted as I once was as a child.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我的心里就像儿时那样充满了矛盾。

yingyinNormal.en: What are the odds that two individuals as unique as ourselves would be connected by someone as comparatively workaday as your son?
yingyinNormal.zh: 像我们这么独特的两个人通过像你儿子这样的庸人而联系上的几率有多大？

yingyinNormal.en: This is the Law of the Jungle, as old and as true as the sky.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本法则就是森林法则，像上苍一般古老正确。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, too bad you're not as strong as the dude in the painting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可惜你不像画中的男人婆那么壮。

yingyinNormal.en: I hope daddy isn't as big of a dick as you, Orphan Boy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望你老爸不是个像你一样的大傻叉，孤儿。

yingyinNormal.en: But why doesn't your gas seem half as smelly as those around you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但为何我们放的屁不像其他人那么臭？

yingyinNormal.en: Was it as easy as it looked? No, sir. No, sir, it wasn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 并不像看上去的那么容易吧? 当然不是，先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Plus, we're not as young as we were when she was like this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再说，我们也不像莉莉当年这么大时那样年轻了。

yingyinNormal.en: After all this time, I know it almost as intimately as my own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么久以来，我对它熟悉得就像我自己的大脑一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, baby, I'm as cool as the other side of the pillow. You feel me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，我冰冷得像枕头的另一面，你感受到了吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: (as well as)也; 以及; 和...一样

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 诸如...之类的；例如；那种的；那些人

sense_info_list.en: used to describe the fact that somebody or something has a particular job or function

examination_example.sentence: Soon after his father's release from prison, Dickens got a better job <highlight>as</highlight> errand boy in law offices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父亲出狱后不久，狄更斯找到了一份更好的工作，在律师事务所当跑腿的。

examination_example.sentence: We think of it simply <highlight>as</highlight> a healthy and helpful flow of intelligent thought.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们简单地认为它是一种健康而有益的智慧思维。

examination_example.sentence: Today we have a tendency to label obesity <highlight>as</highlight> a disgrace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，我们倾向于给肥胖贴上耻辱的标签。

sense_info_list.en: used to indicate by comparison the way that something happens or is done

examination_example.sentence: All good targets should have multiple criteria relating to critical factors such <highlight>as</highlight> time, money, quality and customer feedback.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有好的目标都应具有与关键因素（如时间、金钱、质量和用户反馈）相关的多个标准。

examination_example.sentence: The runaway success of The Pickwick Papers, <highlight>as</highlight> it is generally known today, secured Dickens's fame.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《匹克威克外传》的巨大成功，正如今天人们所知道的那样，确保了狄更斯的名声。

examination_example.sentence: Britain's Labor Party, <highlight>as</highlight> its name implies, has long been associated with trade unionism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国工党，顾名思义，长期以来一直与工会主义联系在一起。

sense_info_list.en: used in comparisons to refer to the extent or degree of something

examination_example.sentence: The robot was the same size <highlight>as</highlight> a regular rat but resembled a simple plastic box on wheels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个机器人和普通老鼠一样大，但看起来像一个简单的带轮子的塑料盒子。

examination_example.sentence: The drive to discover is deeply rooted in humans, much the same <highlight>as</highlight> the basic drives for food or shelter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 探索的动力深植于人类思想，与寻找食物或住所的基本动力大致相同。

examination_example.sentence: It's not <highlight>as</highlight> expensive <highlight>as</highlight> you might think.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它没有你想的那么贵。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> of May, those rates had spiked up to 13.3 per cent and 13.7 per cent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 截至5月份，这两个比例分别飙升至13.3%和13.7%。

examination_example.sentence: They found that middle-aged people with higher measures of abdominal fat scored worse on measures of fluid intelligence <highlight>as</highlight> the years went by.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，随着年龄的增长，腹部脂肪测量值越高的中年人在流体智力测试中的得分越低。

examination_example.sentence: There, <highlight>as</highlight> people got more money, some of them may have more cleared land for cattle to raise for meat, Ferraro says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 费拉罗说，在那里，当人们得到更多的钱，他们中的一些人可能会有更多的空地来饲养牲畜。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> for me, weighing myself every day caused me to shift my focus from being generally healthy and physically active, to focusing solely on the scale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我来说，每天称体重让我把注意力从保持身体健康和积极锻炼转移到仅仅关注体重秤上。

examination_example.sentence: Official retrospections continue <highlight>as</highlight> to why London 2012 failed to "inspire a generation."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于2012年伦敦奥运会为何没能“激励一代人”，官方的回顾仍在继续。

examination_example.sentence: Zoos should have been closed down <highlight>as</highlight> they prioritize money making over animals' wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物园应该被关闭，因为他们把赚钱看得比动物的健康更重要。

examination_example.sentence: Now utopia has grown unfashionable, <highlight>as</highlight> we have gained a deeper appreciation of the range of threats facing us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，乌托邦已经不再流行，因为我们已经对我们面临的各种威胁有了更深的认识。

examination_example.sentence: It's <highlight>as</highlight> if they already know that their degree won't define them in the same way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好像他们已经知道他们的学位不会以同样的方式定义他们。

examination_example.sentence: It is curious that Stephen Koziatek feels almost <highlight>as</highlight> though he has to justify his efforts to give his students a better future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不同寻常的是，Stephen Koziatek似乎觉得他必须证明自己的努力是为了给学生一个更美好的未来。

examination_example.sentence: Other reasons, according to the study, include personal fulfillment such <highlight>as</highlight> staying mentally fit, preventing boredom or avoiding depression.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这项研究，其他原因还包括个人成就感，如保持精神健康、防止无聊或避免抑郁。

examination_example.sentence: But you'll reap benefits such <highlight>as</highlight> less anxiety and improved sleep right away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但你会马上收获一些好处，比如减少焦虑和改善睡眠。

examination_example.sentence: All of which creates huge headaches for institutions, such <highlight>as</highlight> museums, trying to preserve culturally important objects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有这些都给博物馆等试图保护重要文物的机构带来了巨大的麻烦。

sense_info_list.zh: (as well as)也; 以及; 和...一样

examination_example.sentence: Businesses should engage in conversations with IT, compliance, risk, and legal teams to review their privacy, and include in the discussion the customer/user experience designers and coders responsible for the company's user interface, <highlight>as</highlight> well <highlight>as</highlight> the marketers and advertisers responsible for sign-ups, checkout baskets, pricing, and promotions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业应与IT、合规、风控和法律团队进行对话，以审查其隐私，并与包括负责公司用户界面的交互体验设计师和程序开发员，以及负责注册、购物车、定价和促销的营销人员和广告商讨论。

examination_example.sentence: Those pieces included small beds of roses and other items <highlight>as</highlight> well <highlight>as</highlight> a few dozen "nature carpets"—large rectangles decorated with foam pumpkins.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些物品包括几花圃的玫瑰和其他物品，以及几十个“天然地毯”——装饰着泡沫南瓜的大长方形。

examination_example.sentence: Such an approach can both prompt new research <highlight>as</highlight> well <highlight>as</highlight> result in powerful art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的方法既可以促进新的研究，也可以催生出强大的艺术。

word_usage.usage: as和like均可表示"相似"，like为介词，置于名词和代词前，as为连词和副词，置于从句、另一副词或以介词引导的从句前， 在非正式英语中，like常常代替as，用作连词或副词，但正式用语中要避免这么使用。

表示“因为”
as：如果所述理由是明显的或者已知的，则用 as 较 because 更为合适。
because：语气最强，表示因果关系，通常用来回答由 why 引导的疑问句。由 because 引导的分句置于句首时，须用逗号与主句隔开，置于句末时则不用隔开。
for属于并列连词，由它引导的分句表示补充说明性的理由，通常只能置于句末，且必须用逗号与前面的分句隔开。
since：当所述原因是已知的客观事实或被当作推断的理由时用 since，语气略强于 as。
as作为介词时，其含义为“作为”。as作为连词词性时，可以引导各类从句，其中as引导比较状语从句，其基本结构是as…as。前一个as是副词，后一个as是比较状语从句的连词。否定结构为not so much … as …。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 诸如…之类的；例如；那种的；像…的；那些人

examination_example.sentence: I was in the middle of the Amazon with my wife, who was there <highlight>as</highlight> a medical researcher.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我和妻子在亚马逊中部，她是那里的一名医学研究员。

examination_example.sentence: Well, actually, John began his life in the US <highlight>as</highlight> a businessman.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，约翰在美国开始了他的商业生涯。

examination_example.sentence: Since 1958, they have been recognized <highlight>as</highlight> the national theatre of Israel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自1958年以来，它们被公认为以色列的国家剧院。

examination_example.sentence: I'd like to live a creative life and make changes when necessary <highlight>as</highlight> she did.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想过一种有创造力的生活，并像她一样在必要时做出改变。

examination_example.sentence: A local farmer told them the dog sounded like one advertised <highlight>as</highlight> lost in the local paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地一位农民告诉他们，这只狗听起来像是当地报纸上刊登的那只走失的狗。

examination_example.sentence: I mean, I don't see that much of them now <highlight>as</highlight> it is.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我是说，我现在很少见到他们了。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of getting down to a new task <highlight>as</highlight> I had expected, he examined the previous work again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他没有像我预料的那样着手一项新任务，而是又检查了一遍以前的工作。

examination_example.sentence: The yellow and orange stone fruits such <highlight>as</highlight> peaches are high in the carotenoids we turn into vitamin A and which are antioxidants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像桃子这样的黄色和橙色的核果富含类胡萝卜素，类胡萝卜素可以转化为维生素A，是一种抗氧化剂。

examination_example.sentence: Medium color choices are generally furniture pieces such <highlight>as</highlight> sofas, dinner tables or bookshelves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 颜色中等选择通常是沙发、餐桌或书架等家具。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> she was leaving, she was eager to say goodbye to each of us in the nursing team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她要离开的时候，她渴望和护理团队的每一个人道别。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> it became clearer that fashion was what I wanted to do full time, my day-to-day work at the insurance company became harder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我越来越清楚时尚是我想全职做的事情，我在保险公司的日常工作变得更加艰难。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers examined various levels of noise on participants <highlight>as</highlight> they completed tests of creative thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在受试者完成创造性思维测试时，研究人员对他们进行了不同程度的噪音测试。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> he was worried that it would be too warm, he laid it out on the table near an open window.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于担心天气太热，他把它放在桌子上，旁边开着窗户。

examination_example.sentence: Sorry, madam, I have underestimated you <highlight>as</highlight> I didn't know your background.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对不起，女士，我低估了你，因为我不了解你的背景。

examination_example.sentence: That's bad news for the environment, <highlight>as</highlight> these outdated devices consume much more energy than the newer ones that do the same things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对环境来说是个坏消息，因为这些过时的设备会比具有同样功能的新设备消耗更多的能源。

examination_example.sentence: I didn't feel <highlight>as</highlight> though I needed to keep up with anybody else; I was finally with peers who understood me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得我不需要跟得上别人；终于有了理解我的同龄人。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: as表示“像”时是介词或副词。
like表示“像”，一般用作介词，也可用作连词，作定语时只位于名词前。
as引导的从句可放在主句前或后，也可插在主句中。
which引导的非限制性定语从句只能放在主句后；当从句放在主句后，若从句表达说话人对主句的内容持否定或消极的看法时，只能用which。

disambiguation.sense_group: 引导非限制性定语从句

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 诸如…之类的；例如；那种的；像…的；那些人
俗话说；正如老话所说；常言道
众所周知；正如我们所知
与…一样远；至于；远至；一直到；就…而言

examination_example.sentence: You can choose <highlight>as</highlight> many clubs <highlight>as</highlight> you like.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以选择任何你喜欢的俱乐部。

examination_example.sentence: If something goes wrong, you can get help from that person <highlight>as</highlight> soon <highlight>as</highlight> possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果出了问题，你能够尽快得到那个人的帮助。

examination_example.sentence: Ray Tomlinson may not be <highlight>as</highlight> famous <highlight>as</highlight> Bill Gates, but he surely has his place among the geniuses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雷·汤姆林森可能没有比尔·盖茨出名，但他肯定在天才中占有一席之地。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> long <highlight>as</highlight> I don't give up, there is nothing I can't achieve in the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要我不放弃，世界上就没有我做不到的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Stay inside <highlight>as</highlight> long <highlight>as</highlight> you like！
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你在里面想待多久就待多久！

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> long <highlight>as</highlight> you follow what is mentioned above, you will have a wonderful vacation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要你按照上面所说的去做，你将拥有一个美好的假期。

examination_example.sentence: Last year, I went to Italy <highlight>as</highlight> an exchange student.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年，我作为交换生去了意大利。

examination_example.sentence: I was invited <highlight>as</highlight> a special guest to attend the exhibition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我被邀请作为特邀嘉宾参加展览。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> one of the most exciting sports, volleyball was included in the Olympic Games in 1964.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 排球作为最激动人心的运动之一，于1964年被列入奥运会比赛项目。

examination_example.sentence: I was walking on air <highlight>as</highlight> John and I crossed the playground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当约翰和我穿过操场时，我感到欣喜若狂。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> temperatures have increased, however, some of the ice has begun to disappear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，随着气温的升高，一些冰层已经开始消失。

examination_example.sentence: A few teachers led the kids through the whole song <highlight>as</highlight> Anthony watched.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在安东尼的注视下，几位老师带领孩子们唱完了整首歌。

examination_example.sentence: In American history, Benjamin Franklin was a scientist, inventor and writer <highlight>as</highlight> well <highlight>as</highlight> a leader of the American Revolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国历史上，本杰明·富兰克林是一位科学家、发明家和作家，也是美国革命的领袖。

examination_example.sentence: Maybe the teacher who is watching over all the kids needs someone to talk to <highlight>as</highlight> well．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许照看所有孩子的老师也需要找人倾诉。

examination_example.sentence: Besides going on studying Chinese, she shows great interest in Chinese kung fu <highlight>as</highlight> well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了继续学习中文，她还对中国功夫表现出极大的兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: There is no set rule <highlight>as</highlight> to what makes dumpling fillings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至于饺子馅是什么做的，没有固定的规则。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> for eating and drinking on the subway, different people have different opinions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至于在地铁上吃喝，不同的人有不同的看法。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>As</highlight> for the future, he has said that he isn't exactly sure what he will choose to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至于未来，他曾说过，他并不完全确定自己会选择做什么。

examination_example.sentence: Here, you can come and go <highlight>as</highlight> you please.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这里，您可以随意出入。

examination_example.sentence: His life went on <highlight>as</highlight> usual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的生活照常进行。

examination_example.sentence: Parents may get mad if children do this <highlight>as</highlight> they don't want their children to be <highlight>as</highlight> poor <highlight>as</highlight> beggars in the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果孩子这样做，父母可能会生气，因为他们不希望自己的孩子将来像乞丐一样穷。

word_usage.usage:
as ... as指“两个人或物在某方面一样”，as和as之间要用形容词或副词的原形。既可以用在肯定句里，也可以用在否定句中，而so ... as只能用在否定句里。
示例：
(1) He is as old as she (is).
他跟她年纪一样大。
(2) He is not so old as she (is).
他没有她年纪大。

介词like和副词equally同as的词意相同，都表示“像...一样”，注意不能同时出现在一个句子中。
示例：她像她母亲那样慈善。
误 She was kind as like as her mother.
正 She was as kind as her mother.

as...as possible结构中的形容词或副词应是可比较的，immediately没有比较级和最高级形式，故不可用于这个结构中。
示例：你必须尽快离开此地。
误 You must get out of this place as immediately as possible.
正 You must get out of this place as soon as possible.
